content:
I've shared a post on Reddit - Roc Dev Log Update for anyone who may be interested in what's been happening.

Let me know what you think. :smiley:

Hi Luke, I was just popping in after a long time to see progress on Roc and it was just the kind of thing I was looking for, thank you! On a related note -- is there a rough tracker somewhere of what's been done and what's "left"?

Thank you @Jonathan, really glad to hear you found this helpful.

We kind of have a tracker in https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/tree/main/src#status -- but I've forgotten to keep it updated.

I'll add that to my TODO list to give it some love later this week.
